name: ARK: Survival Evolved
description: ARK does have a native Linux version but that one looks ugly. This installer allows you to play ARK in a more beautiful version.
notes:
- After a few hours or maybe minutes, depending on your system and the map you're playing, the game could fall into an stop n' go mode. Just restart ARK and you'll be good.

- Sometimes changing graphic settings to low and back to your configuration solves the problem sometimes as well.
content:
game:
  appid: 346110
  arch: win64
system:
  env:
    DXVK_HUD: 0
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
  overrides:
    xaudio2_7: native,builtin
